name: Advanced Checkers
description:
Advanced Checkers

Play the most advanced checkers computer opponents ever created!

*Note* Playing in hard mode is very difficult, and for checker experts only.

Play your friends in checkers too on one device, or on two separate devices over Bluetooth. Advanced Checkers features:

- Three difficulty modes (Easy, Medium, and Hard)
- Bluetooth two player mode
- Unlimited undo capability!
- High resolution graphics
- Marble checker board
- Dozens of nature backgrounds
- Change checker color at any time!

All Checkers (also known as Draughts) rules are implemented i.e. double / triple jumps, King mode, and more.

Become an expert at checkers with Advanced Checkers and get ready to play the pros.
